definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: The lacquered screen that tells the history of a clan of scholars?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉人们一派雅士传奇的漆质屏风？

sentences.english: Here in this pretty world Gallantry too its last bow.
sentences.chinese: 曾有一群雅士在此世外桃源享受最后的升平。

sentences.english: Celebrated gentlemen and refined scholars take it easy between modern bustling and nature's stillness.
sentences.chinese: 名绅，雅士从容于现代繁华与自然沉静之间。

sentences.english: Each Kunqu play was an exquisite literary work by some lofty-minded literati .
sentences.chinese: 昆曲的剧本大都是文人雅士精心创作的文学作品。

sentences.english: Retired cloth-merchants and rusticating attorneys had not discovered it as yet;
sentences.chinese: 倦游的商贾和爱好山林的雅士们还没有发现它。

sentences.english: The celebrities and the persons of refined taste liked to present the inner-painted snuff bottles to officials and friends as exquisite gifts.
sentences.chinese: 名人雅士多以内画壶作为别致礼品赠送达官友人。

definition: refined activities of the intellectuals (regarding literature, paintings etc)
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
